ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who have iman and show taqwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who believe and obey God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the ones who believe and are God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who have faith and fear God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who have accepted faith and practice piety.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who believed, and have Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who believe and guarded (against evil):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those who believe, and are godfearing --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those who believe and keep their duty (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For those who believe and are mindful of God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They who believed and have been fearing God;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who have faith and are Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who believe and (constantly) guard against evil;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who believed (in the Oneness of Allah - Islamic Monotheism), and used to fear Allah much (by abstaining from evil deeds and sins and by doing righteous deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who believe and are cautious
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who believe and are aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those who believed and were fearing Allah
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:63] They are, those who believe and fear, God, by observing His commandments and prohibitions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then showed who these are, saying: (Those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and keep their duty (to Allah)) and ward off disbelief, idolatry, and indecencies.
